paper_abstract: In this paper, a sufficient condition is presented to ensure the complete stability of a cellular neural networks (CNNs) that output functions are a set of piecewise sigmoid nonlinear functions. The convergence theorem of the Gauss-Seidel method and Gauss-Seidel method, which is an iterative technique for solving a linear algebraic equation, plays an important role in our discussion.
paper_title: A new sufficient condition on the complete stability of a class cellular neural networks
